original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND b.UserId = c.UserId AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND v.VoteTypeId=5
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CommentCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E3.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2E3E4.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 5
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4E6E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E3E4E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E3E4E6.PostId=E5.PostId)
